store.yimi.joplin-folder-mapping.name: Folder Mapping

joplin.plugin.hotstrings.name: Hotstrings & Hotkeys
joplin.plugin.hotstrings.description: Uses a user-defined hotstring-and-hotkey dictionary to replace hotstrings in any note with replacement strings of the user's choice. To start using the plugin, make a new note and enter '!!!HOTSTRINGS!!!' as its top line.
joplin.plugin.hotstrings.author: ntczkjfg

com.bwat47.copyashtml.name: Copy as HTML
com.bwat47.copyashtml.description: Allows you to copy text with HTML (rich text) formatting from the markdown editor (including images). Also allows you to copy as plain text (without markdown formatting)
com.bwat47.copyashtml.author: bwat47

embedImages.label: Embed images as base64
embedImages.description: If enabled, images in selection will be embedded as base64 in HTML output.

exportFullHtml.label: Export as full HTML document
exportFullHtml.description: If enabled, exported HTML will be a full document with your custom stylesheet (copy-as-html-user.css in your profile folder).

downloadRemoteImages.label: Download and embed remote images
downloadRemoteImages.description: If enabled (along with Embed images as base64), remote HTTP/HTTPS images will be downloaded and embedded as base64. If un-checked, the resulting document may contain links to external resources.

preserveSuperscript.label: Preserve superscript characters (^TEST^)
preserveSuperscript.description: If enabled, ^TEST^ will remain ^TEST^ in plain text output.

preserveSubscript.label: Preserve subscript characters (~TEST~)
preserveSubscript.description: If enabled, ~TEST~ will remain ~TEST~ in plain text output.

preserveEmphasis.label: Preserve emphasis characters (*TEST* or _TEST_)
preserveEmphasis.description: If enabled, *TEST* or _TEST_ will remain as-is in plain text output.

preserveBold.label: Preserve bold characters (**TEST** or __TEST__)
preserveBold.description: If enabled, **TEST** or __TEST__ will remain as-is in plain text output.

preserveHeading.label: Preserve heading characters (## TEST)
preserveHeading.description: If enabled, ## TEST will remain as-is in plain text output.

preserveStrikethrough.label: Preserve strikethrough characters (~~TEST~~)
preserveStrikethrough.description: If enabled, ~~TEST~~ will remain as-is in plain text output.

preserveHorizontalRule.label: Preserve horizontal rule (---)
preserveHorizontalRule.description: If enabled, horizontal rules will be preserved as --- in plain text output.

preserveMark.label: Preserve highlight characters (==TEST==)
preserveMark.description: If enabled, ==TEST== will remain as-is in plain text output.

preserveInsert.label: Preserve insert characters (++TEST++)
preserveInsert.description: If enabled, ++TEST++ will remain as-is in plain text output.

displayEmojis.label: Display emojis
displayEmojis.description: If enabled, emojis will be displayed in the plain text output.

hyperlinkBehavior.label: Plain Text hyperlink behavior
hyperlinkBehavior.description: How external HTTP/HTTPS links should appear in plain text output.

indentType.label: List indentation type
indentType.description: How nested lists should be indented in plain text output.

com.levi.NoteStatus.name: Note Status
com.levi.NoteStatus.description: To implement Inkdrop like Status feature in Joplin
com.levi.NoteStatus.author: Deeptangshu Saha

com.cenktekin.ai-tag-suggester.name: AI Tag Suggester
com.cenktekin.ai-tag-suggester.description: An AI-powered tag suggestion tool that analyzes note content to recommend relevant tags. Users can select from the suggestions and apply them to their notes, streamlining the organization process.

com.bwat47.simple-image-resize.name: Simple Image Resize
com.bwat47.simple-image-resize.description: A simple dialogue to switch image syntax between markdown/html and losslessly resize images
com.bwat47.simple-image-resize.author: bwat47

defaultResizeMode.label: Default resize mode
defaultResizeMode.description: The resize mode that will be selected by default when opening the resize dialog

com.bwat47.paste-as-markdown.name: Paste as Markdown
com.bwat47.paste-as-markdown.description: Paste HTML formatted text as markdown
com.bwat47.paste-as-markdown.author: bwat47

includeImages.label: Include images
includeImages.description: If enabled, images from HTML will be converted to markdown image syntax. If disabled, images will be removed entirely.

convertImagesToResources.label: Include images
convertImagesToResources.description: If enabled, http(s) and base64 images are stored as Joplin resources (requires 'Include images').

normalizeQuotes.label: Include images
normalizeQuotes.description: Convert Word/Office smart quotes to regular quotes for better markdown compatibility.

forceTightLists.label: Force tight lists
forceTightLists.description: Remove blank lines between list items in output Markdown.

tech.willenglish.dndplugin.name: Dungeons and Dragons Character Manager
tech.willenglish.dndplugin.description: A Joplin plugin for the creation and management of DnD 5e Character Sheets
tech.willenglish.dndplugin.author: Will English

com.joplin.plugin.bible.verses.name: Bible Verses
com.joplin.plugin.bible.verses.description: Link bible verses to bible verse references in editor
com.joplin.plugin.bible.verses.author: Kevin Woods

com.cipherswami.quick.note.name: Quick Note
com.cipherswami.quick.note.description: Quickly jot down notes on startup or with a shortcut.
com.cipherswami.quick.note.author: Aravind Potluri

jopdoc.nsharris247.name: Jopdoc
jopdoc.nsharris247.description: Adds the DocX format to Joplin using the Pandoc Document Converter
jopdoc.nsharris247.author: nsharris247

joplin-ntb-copy-paste.name: Copy/Paste commands for Notes and Notebooks
joplin-ntb-copy-paste.description: Implements copy and paste command for notes and notebooks
joplin-ntb-copy-paste.author: Kamil Horvat

com.cipherswami.secure.notes.name: Secure Notes
com.cipherswami.secure.notes.description: Keeps your Joplin notes safe with password and encryption.
com.cipherswami.secure.notes.author: Aravind Potluri

net.sis-soft.copyCode.name: SIS•SOFT Code Copy
net.sis-soft.copyCode.description: Adds a button to each code block in Joplin Markdown to copy its content.
net.sis-soft.copyCode.author: SIS•SOFT

com.github.TheScriptingGuy.joplin-plugin.name: Repeating To-Dos
com.github.TheScriptingGuy.joplin-plugin.description: A powerful and comprehensive plugin for to-do repetition/recurrence
com.github.TheScriptingGuy.joplin-plugin.author: The Scripting Guy / BeatLink

com.bwat47.heading-navigator.name: Heading Navigator
com.bwat47.heading-navigator.description: Overlay panel to navigate through headings in the markdown editor using the keyboard
com.bwat47.heading-navigator.author: bwat47
